template_input_params.name: datacenter
template_input_params.label: datacenter
template_input_params.description: Target vSphere datacenter for Virtual Machine creation

template_input_params.name: vcpu
template_input_params.label: vcpu
template_input_params.description: Number of Virtual CPU for the Virtual Machine

template_input_params.name: memory
template_input_params.label: memory
template_input_params.description: Memory for Virtual Machine in MBs

template_input_params.name: cluster
template_input_params.label: cluster
template_input_params.description: Target vSphere Cluster to host the Virtual Machine

template_input_params.name: network_label
template_input_params.label: network_label
template_input_params.description: vSphere Port Group or Network label for Virtual Machine's vNIC

template_input_params.name: ipv4_prefix_length
template_input_params.label: ipv4_prefix_length
template_input_params.description: IPv4 Prefix length for vNIC configuration

template_input_params.name: storage
template_input_params.label: storage
template_input_params.description: Data store or storage cluster name for target VMs disks

template_input_params.name: vm_template
template_input_params.label: vm_template
template_input_params.description: Source VM or Template label for cloning

template_input_params.name: allow_selfsigned_cert

template_input_params.description: Communication with vsphere server with self signed certificate
